ProjectTitle: Oxytocin therapy in children with autism spectrum disorder and co-occurring intellectual disability: examination of desirability, clinical efficacy and therapeutic augmentation by psychosocial training
InitialFeedbackHistory: 04/04/2024 [REDACTED] sharing data on OSF please make sure it is fully anonymous without any risk to re-identify the subjects. [REDACTED] this is not possible please use RDR where you can restrict access, you can import your data from OSF using the integration dashboard: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard. [REDACTED] publishing data in OSF please register the metadata in LIRIAS so it will appear on your publication list (for RDR this will be registered automatically), see https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/output/lirias/register-datasets-in-lirias 04/04/2024 [REDACTED] sharing data on OSF please make sure it is fully anonymous without any risk to re-identify the subjects.
